name: Evenfall
description:
Night looms on a graveyard where the souls of the undead warriors will not rest. It is up to the Hero knight to save the day. an addicting hack n slash game that is easy to pick up and rack up the score. how many kills and what level can you reach?

The first game made by Jimmi of Good Doggo games in Toronto. based on a love of 16 bit pixel games he grew up on in the early 90s.
